verses.verse: וְהֶחֱזִיקוּ֩ <S%H2388><s%> shall take hold שֶׁ֨בַע <S%H7651><s%> seven נָשִׁ֜ים <S%H802><s%> women בְּאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man אֶחָ֗ד <S%H259><s%> of one בַּיּ֤וֹם <S%H3117><s%> And in that day הַהוּא֙ <S%H1931><s%> he לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> saying לַחְמֵ֣נוּ <S%H3899><s%> our own bread נֹאכֵ֔ל <S%H398><s%> We will eat וְשִׂמְלָתֵ֖נוּ <S%H8071><s%> our own apparel נִלְבָּ֑שׁ <S%H3847><s%> and wear רַ֗ק <S%H7535><s%> let יִקָּרֵ֤א <S%H7121><s%> only let us be called שִׁמְךָ֙ <S%H8034><s%> by thy name עָלֵ֔ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> and אֱסֹ֖ף <S%H622><s%> to take away חֶרְפָּתֵֽנוּ׃ <S%H2781><s%> our reproach ס

בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> In that day הַה֗וּא <S%H1931><s%> he יִֽהְיֶה֙ <S%H1961><s%> become צֶ֣מַח <S%H6780><s%> shall the branch יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD לִצְבִ֖י <S%H6643><s%> be beautiful וּלְכָב֑וֹד <S%H3519><s%> and glorious וּפְרִ֤י <S%H6529><s%> and the fruit הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> of the earth לְגָא֣וֹן <S%H1347><s%> [shall be] excellent וּלְתִפְאֶ֔רֶת <S%H8597><s%> and comely for לִפְלֵיטַ֖ת <S%H6413><s%> them that are escaped יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וְהָיָ֣ה ׀ <S%H1961><s%> will come הַנִּשְׁאָ֣ר <S%H7604><s%> And it shall come to pass [that he that is] left בְּצִיּ֗וֹן <S%H6726><s%> in Zion וְהַנּוֹתָר֙ <S%H3498><s%> and [he that] remaineth בִּיר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <S%H3389><s%> in Jerusalem קָד֖וֹשׁ <S%H6918><s%> holy יֵאָ֣מֶר <S%H559><s%> shall be called ל֑וֹ כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> who הַכָּת֥וּב <S%H3789><s%> [even] every one that is written לַחַיִּ֖ים <S%H2416><s%> among the living בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> in Jerusalem

אִ֣ם ׀ <S%H518><s%> When רָחַ֣ץ <S%H7364><s%> shall have washed away אֲדֹנָ֗י <S%H136><s%> When the Lord אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> צֹאַ֣ת <S%H6675><s%> the filth בְּנוֹת־ <S%H1323><s%> of the daughters צִיּ֔וֹן <S%H6726><s%> of Zion וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דְּמֵ֥י <S%H1818><s%> the blood יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem יָדִ֣יחַ <S%H1740><s%> and shall have purged מִקִּרְבָּ֑הּ <S%H7130><s%> from the midst בְּר֥וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> thereof by the spirit מִשְׁפָּ֖ט <S%H4941><s%> of judgment וּבְר֥וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> and by the spirit בָּעֵֽר׃ <S%H1197><s%> of burning

וּבָרָ֣א <S%H1254><s%> will create יְהוָ֡ה <S%H3069><s%> God עַל֩ <S%H5921><s%> over כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> the whole מְכ֨וֹן <S%H4349><s%> upon every dwelling place הַר־ <S%H2022><s%> of mount צִיּ֜וֹן <S%H6726><s%> Zion וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and over מִקְרָאֶ֗הָ <S%H4744><s%> and upon her assemblies עָנָ֤ן ׀ <S%H6051><s%> a cloud יוֹמָם֙ <S%H3119><s%> by day וְעָשָׁ֔ן <S%H6227><s%> and smoke וְנֹ֛גַהּ <S%H5051><s%> and the shining אֵ֥שׁ <S%H784><s%> fire לֶהָבָ֖ה <S%H3852><s%> of a flaming לָ֑יְלָה <S%H3915><s%> by night כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all כָּב֖וֹד <S%H3519><s%> for upon all the glory חֻפָּֽה׃ <S%H2646><s%> [shall be] a defence

וְסֻכָּ֛ה <S%H5521><s%> And there shall be a tabernacle תִּהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become לְצֵל־ <S%H6738><s%> for a shadow יוֹמָ֖ם <S%H3119><s%> in the daytime מֵחֹ֑רֶב <S%H2721><s%> from the heat וּלְמַחְסֶה֙ <S%H4268><s%> and for a place of refuge וּלְמִסְתּ֔וֹר <S%H4563><s%> and for a covert מִזֶּ֖רֶם <S%H2230><s%> from storm וּמִמָּטָֽר׃ <S%H4306><s%> and from rain פ
